author: Danielle Garrand
title: More people are applying for foster pets amid outbreak
description: Social distancing can be lonely, but many Americans found the perfect solution — fostering a pet in need.
content: It seems people around the country aren't just stocking up on toilet paper and frozen food amid the coronavirus pandemic, many are also taking home a new foster pet. Animal rescue organizations are reporting a large uptick in interested foster parents over th… [+3617 chars]
